title: New: Azealia Banks – Aquababe (Produced by Machinedrum)
content:
A rare known fact about Azealia Banks is that when she isn’t blocking people on Twitter or throwing hissy fits that involve sacking her management, she also makes music.

Weird, huh? Here’s another new cut from Miss Banks, again with production from Machinedrum, and it’s marginally better than her previous attempts, despite it’s crass language and the lyrical complexity of a three year old. As with many of her other tracks, I can’t help feeling that the beat on Aquababe deserves a better MC….
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
